query: Q1. Which ad component has three fields that allow 30 characters each?
options:
the headline
 the description
 the website URL
 the call-to-action

query: Q3. Griff has noticed that his best-performing keywords has started to see an increased CPC, despite no changes on his part. What is the most likely reason for this?
options:
ad Quality Score increase
 reduction of landing page inbound links
 reduction in daily budget
 increased competition

query: Q4. You are running a campaign that will consist of 15 ads. What is the minimum number of ad groups that you can have as part of the campaign?
Q5. Braxton has his maximum bid set to $5. His competitor bids $3.95. How much will Braxton pay upon winning the auction?
Q7. Which choice is `not` an option when configuring `ad` extensions?
options:
product extensions
 sitelink extensions
 message extensions
 callout extensions

query: Q8. Which choice is a best practice when designing a landing page for an ad campaign?
options:
having lots of inbound links
 using JavaScript
 relevant content matching the ad
 enrolling in Ad Central

query: Q9. Which choice has no impact on Quality Score?
options:
ad relevance
 expected clickthrough rate
 landing page experience
 max CPC bid

query: Q13. An auction has a normal bid of $.50 but there is an active bid adjustment of -20%. What is the final bid amount?
Q15. Which ad rotation setting uses machine learning to prioritize ads based upon expected performance?
options:
Rotate evenly
 Optimize
 Manual rotation
 Rotate indefinitely

query: Q16. Clara is running retargeted display ads, but does not want her audience to experience ad fatique. What should be configure?
options:
ad scheduling
 a frequency cap
 an impression cap
 auto ad rotation

query: Q17. If someone performs a search for "most comfortable chair", which ad description text would likely perform the best?
options:
Don't be uncomfortable. Get a new chair. Try the LumbarPro today.
 Experience the most comfortable chair, with more than 1,000 five-star reviews.
 Try the LumbarPro, a chair that has been reviewed as comfortable by more than 1,000 people.
 Need a new chair? The LumbarPro is the highest rated chair. Try this chair, today.

query: Q18. Why would you use callout extensions?
options:
to share pricing on various business offerings
 to highlight key features and unique offers
 to show reviews of your product or service
 to add phone numbers to the ad

query: Q19. You have a maximum CPC bid of $4 for the keyword **Coffee Mugs**. What tool could you use to determine the projected result of raising the bid to $4.50?
options:
CPC Optimizer
 Bid Simulator
 Google Analytics
 Lighthouse

query: Q20. Which keyword status is not valid?
options:
Geographically restricted
 Under review
 Paused
 Eligible

query: Q21. When reviewing a campaign, you notice that your cost per conversion on desktop is much lower than on mobile. How should you optimize the bidding strategy is you wanted to increase the overall number of campaign conversions?
options:
Increase the desktop bid adjustment for this campaign
 Increase the ad frequency for the campaign
 Decrease the desktop bid adjustment for the campaign
 Increase both the desktop and mobile ad adjustments

query: Q22. With Google's Active View technology, when is an impression of a display ad considered viewable?
options:
when the user leaves the page the ad appears on
 when any part of the ad is on-screen for 5 seconds
 when the entire ad first appears on the screen
 when at least 50% of the ad is on-screen for at least 1 second

query: Q23. Rhama wants to increase her bids for any customers that are within a selected radius of her storefront. What would you recommend she do?
options:
Create a location bid adjustment
 Use automated bidding
 Create an ad group with higher bids, targeted to that geographical region
 Restrict the campaign to only the radius

query: Q24. The standard approach to submitting product data to Google Ads is through the use of a product **\_**.
options:
link
 ad
 feed
 extension

query: Q25. In order to create a similat audience, you must provide Google Ads with **\_**.
options:
a budget
 a tracking pixel
 all of these answers
 a seed list of users

query: Q26. How do responsive search ads increase your likelihood of reaching more customers?
options:
They provide multiple headline and description options, so ads automatically evolve based on performance.
 Responsive search ads are mobile optimized
 All of these answers
 Responsive reach ads receive preferential treatment in the google ads auction

query: Q27. Sion is having a sale that will last three days. He wants his ad text to show how much time is remaining in the sale. Would would you recoment for Sion?
options:
Use the sale extension and set the sale duration for each time zone.
 Do not include the sale in the ad text, as this likley violated Google Ads editorial policies.
 Add a countdown customizer to the ad text.
 Manually adjust the ad text as frequently as possible to reflect the time remaining

query: Q28. Tabitha has a mobile application that is complementary to her website. She wants to make it known to potential customers, but driving app downloads is not her main goal. What would you recommend she configure on her Google Ads?
options:
app extension
 Universal App campaign
 Mobile App campaign
 download extension

query: Q29. Which solution allows you to show ads in Google search results, only if the user has previously visited your website?
options:
MDC
 ECPC
 RLSA
 Target ROAS
